attributes.action: Ban media to use the names of innocent people who are NOT CONVICTED yet!!!!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People who have been arrested but later found innocent in the courts are subject to media scrutiny. If they are NOT CONVICTED and found INNOCENT in court, media should not be allowed to use the names of people who are NOT CONVICTED. Law must be changed to protect those who are innocent people.
